_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The five timely gifts [an5.36:4.4]: A gift to someone setting out on a journey
A gift to someone who is sick
A gift at a time of famine
Presenting the freshly harvested grains and fruits first to those who are ethical
The qualities of a religious donation at: Given with a clear and confident mind
Those who benefit from a religious donat: They too have a share in the merit.
